seoDescription: Turn portraits into high-energy twerk dance clips—perfect for dance channels, music launches, and viral short-form content.

hero.heading: Free AI Twerk Generator
hero.description: Launch eye-catching twerk videos in seconds. The AI syncs body motion, lighting, and camera moves with the beat, making it ideal for dance creators and music promos.

gallery.heading: Preview the Energy
gallery.subheading: From neon street vibes to spotlight performances, find the rhythm that fits your story.

galleryItems.title: Urban Neon
galleryItems.description: Fluorescent lighting and handheld motion amplify street-party energy.

galleryItems.title: Stage Focus
galleryItems.description: Spotlights lock onto the performer, highlighting every move.

galleryItems.title: Beat Sync Close-ups
galleryItems.description: Dynamic close-ups emphasize rhythm, motion, and hype.

items.title: Beat-Synced Motion
items.description: AI aligns dance moves and camera flow with your track's BPM for a polished result.

items.title: Lighting Presets
items.description: Nightclub, concert, and street presets instantly set the mood.

items.title: Prompt-Controlled Styling
items.description: Use prompts to fine-tune outfits, backgrounds, move intensity, and camera angles.

items.title: Platform-Friendly Formats
items.description: Export in vertical or square ratios ready for TikTok, Instagram, or YouTube Shorts.

valueProps.heading: Why Creators Love This Twerk Generator
valueProps.description: Publish dance clips that boost reach and engagement without manual editing.

items.title: Simple Workflow
items.description: Upload a photo, choose a vibe, and export—no editing skills required.

items.title: Realistic Choreography
items.description: Advanced body rigs produce fluid, natural dance motion.

items.title: Model Flexibility
items.description: Switch between multiple AI providers to get the perfect aesthetic.

moreEffects.heading: More Dance & Beat Effects
moreEffects.description: Explore hip-hop, jazz, and performance-focused templates to keep audiences watching.

items.question: How many photos are required?
items.answer: One clear full-body or half-body portrait is enough to create the video.

items.question: Can I set my own music?
items.answer: Yes—add rhythm or style keywords in prompts or advanced settings to guide the beat.

items.question: What resolution can I export?
items.answer: Standard resolutions are free; 4K or custom ratios are available in premium tiers.

items.question: Does it support batch generation?
items.answer: Batch upload is supported, making it great for dance crews and brand campaigns.

items.question: Is there a cost?
items.answer: Core presets are free; advanced lighting or camera packs require a few credits.
